title: How to join a band when I’m 13 - Quora

response.answer_text: I hope this doesn’t offend you, but for your age, joining a band would be too early, puberty will hit and you guys will mostly break up due to hormonal emotions. My advice is, practice, practice, practice. Go to band gigs, learn from people who have experienced being in a band. Pick an idol, train so hard that your idol becomes your rival. Have fun and good luck!

my friend , JUST DO IT ! if you've got the will , the way will follow . just keep in mind that you probably won't be able to play in any bars or clubs obviously but hey if you start now you're at the perfect age too perfect you are instrument and talent and if you stick with it by the time you're of age then you can start getting paying gigs , plus you will meet a lot of cool and interesting other musicians and people and possibly some hot chickies! best wishes and best of luck to you.
